name: Ukrainian World Congress
goal:
The purposes and objects of the UWC are to:
1) promote the solidarity and represent the interests of the Ukrainian people throughout the world;
2) foster and coordinate an international network of its member organizations that support and promote the development of Ukrainian religious, linguistic, spiritual, historical, cultural, and social heritage;
3) support the independence, territorial integrity, national identity and economic prosperity of Ukraine;
4) strengthen the bonds of Ukrainian communities and Ukrainians in the diaspora with Ukraine, including government and civil society;
5) secure the rights, status and interests of Ukrainians and Ukrainian communities and to defend them wherever they are denied, violated or threatened;
6) promote democracy and human rights around the world, including monitoring democratic processes such as elections and referendums; and
cooperate with governments, nations, organizations, and individuals, to accomplish the above goals in the spirit of peace, freedom, equality and justice.
interests: Business and Industry, Communication, Culture, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Enlargement, External Relations, Foreign affairs and security policy, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Institutional affairs, International co-operation and development, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Sport, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Youth
euInitiatives:
- European Neighbourhood Policy, Eastern Partnership
- Common Foreign and Security Policy/Common Security and Defense Policy
- Policy on sanctions
- Countering Russian disinformation and propaganda, development of strategic communication
- Human Rights protection
